rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Физическая Рукотворная Вещь
Physical Human-Made Thing
Ανθρωπογενές Υλικό Πράγμα
Hergestelltes
Chose matérielle fabriquée
Coisa Material Fabricada
人造实体物
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises all persistent physical items that are purposely created by human activity. This class comprises man-made objects, such as a swords, and man-made features, such as rock art. No assumptions are made as to the extent of modification required to justify regarding an object as man-made. For example, a “cup and ring” carving on bedrock is regarded as instance of E24 Physical Human-Made Thing.
